title: seek3r
author: seek3r
created_time: November 24, 2022, 09:51:19 AMLast edit: November 24, 2022, 10:24:10 AM by seek3r
content: Hey there,anybody out here who is interested in a full set of the History Series 2020 from Coldkey?The serial of each card is identical. (#22)I have the same serial even for other editions like Halving Series (#22 is the first of the silver variant).The cards are still fully loaded (approx. 0.07 BTC) and undamaged.If it appeals to anyone, feel free to make me an offer. Here or by DMIt is not a distress sale and I have no exact asking price. So please make an offer, anything else will be ignored.

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: Wow, can you tell me how many cards will be included in this amazing deal?

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: Hookzup1 on November 24, 2022, 04:14:35 PMWow, can you tell me how many cards will be included in this amazing deal?if i'm not mistaken there are a total of 18 ColdKey cards that are then sent from germany

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Very nice! Looking back, I feel lucky just to have a full set, (Mostly same serials, but some variations)... And still growing since I just received my latest Q2-2021 cards! Good luck, although I'm fairly sure it will go quickly!

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Quote from: Hookzup1 on November 24, 2022, 04:14:35 PMWow, can you tell me how many cards will be included in this amazing deal?Sure. 12 cards for each month of the year for the History 2020 series. And 2 cards for the Halving Series.But this is not all! Just the sets that are mentioned in the OP!I got a lot of Coldkey cards, I tried to not skip any release but I don’t have an exact overview for now  Just wanted to start it of here and see if there is some potential. Quote from: owlcatz on November 24, 2022, 04:38:33 PMVery nice! Looking back, I feel lucky just to have a full set, (Mostly same serials, but some variations)... And still growing since I just received my latest Q2-2021 cards! Good luck, although I'm fairly sure it will go quickly!  Thanks owl. I want this set in good hands!!Edit:Almost forgot it: if it was possible I got the same serial on each card. Maybe a positive thing for a true collector!The Halving series had three different variants so it was not possible to catch each card with #22.But me and yogg tried the best, the Bronze variant has for example #122

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: A small push here to get the attention of some collectors who just missed it out yet.  I'd really like to give it to a collector as a complete package before auctioning off the Coldkey cards individually.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: seek3r on November 27, 2022, 09:15:24 PMA small push here to get the attention of some collectors who just missed it out yet.  I'd really like to give it to a collector as a complete package before auctioning off the Coldkey cards individually.  Before you auction them off as solo cards, maybe try to at least keep the "mini-sets". As far as I know cards were sold in 3 consecutive months with similar motvies from the same collab artist, right? Splitting these is actually considered a sin, so beware!

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on December 04, 2022, 06:49:34 PMBefore you auction them off as solo cards, maybe try to at least keep the "mini-sets". As far as I know cards were sold in 3 consecutive months with similar motvies from the same collab artist, right? Splitting these is actually considered a sin, so beware!Exactly. That was my original intention.The collab artists - including you - have been changed quarterly, but if I don't find anyone (it looks like I will) I will just sell them individually... even if it breaks my heart

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: Can we get a picture of all that will be included with matching numbers?

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Quote from: Hookzup1 on December 05, 2022, 04:17:08 PMCan we get a picture of all that will be included with matching numbers? What do you exactly mean? I got the whole History 2020 with #22 for example. The Q1 from 2021 with the same serial will be auctioned this week by minerjones. I shipped them by the end of last week.I got every card with #22 when it was possible.  If there is real high interest in the whole set I will make some pictures for you, otherwise it will be auctioned in small batches  in the next few weeks.

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: There were also a few history cards in 2019  and 2021and some crypto bonds, covid cards, buyer funded, bitbill commemorative sets, and the halving wallets you mentioned also just curious what others you may have that contain the same matching  numbers

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Quote from: Hookzup1 on December 05, 2022, 10:47:43 PMThere were also a few history cards in 2019  and 2021and some crypto bonds, covid cards, buyer funded, bitbill commemorative sets, and the halving wallets you mentioned also just curious what others you may have that contain the same matching  numbersCame into Coldkey in late 2019 so I dont have them matched back then. The 2021 are as I mentioned before in auction in the next few days. Got some covid cards and buyer funded aswell. I have all 4 bitbill commemorative cards aswell in #22.It's special with the Halving series cards. There was only a #22 there (and that's the first possible silver variant). But fortunately this is also in my possession

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: Sorry to make it confusing, I guess I was just curious how many #22 cards in total were being offered? 12 or 15 history, 2 halving, and 4 bitbills is what I think you have mentioned so far? Total funded value of .07 and 18 or 21 cards?

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Quote from: Hookzup1 on December 06, 2022, 06:25:54 PMSorry to make it confusing, I guess I was just curious how many #22 cards in total were being offered? 12 or 15 history, 2 halving, and 4 bitbills is what I think you have mentioned so far? Total funded value of .07 and 18 or 21 cards?List of #22 cards:History 2020 (around 0.07 BTC) split up to:Januar (funded with 0.00774953 BTC)Februar (funded with 0.00590667 BTC)March (funded with 0.00650787BTC)April (funded with 0.00829875 BTC)May (funded with 0.00611695 BTC)June (funded with 0.0058072 BTC)July (funded with 0.00609013 BTC)August (funded with 0.00524096 BTC)September (funded with 0.00497512 BTC)October (funded with 0.00552913 BTC)November (funded with 0.00431555 BTC)December (funded with 0.00320965 BTC)History 2021Q1 with contains the months Januar, Februar and March will be auctioned soon by minerjones.Halving Series Silver series 2 cards which are each funded with 0.00625 BTC = combined 0.0125 BTCUnfunded cards- COVID Edition- Bitbills (4 cards)- some individual buyer funded cards (cant access them right now, can take photos later!)The Halving Series Bronze Edition with #122 will be auctioned by minerjones soon too.

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: Perfect, thank you, I guess I'll just wait for the auctions then see what other matching number cards are available if I win

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: UPDATEFirst auction, which is managed by MJ, is live:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5426657
